title: Essential interview skills: teachers guide (MS)
brief_description: This teacher’s guide is designed to accompany the short video, ‘Essential interview skills’, produced to help young people who are preparing for work and/or tertiary entrance. It addresses many common questions such as “What are prospective employers looking for?” and features discussions with employers and universities. The video can be used in a variety of classroom situations such as VET, SOSE, Industry, Enterprise and Technology design studies, home groups, study skills seminar or work experience preparation seminars.
